aiFeatures.name: Smarter Bidding
aiFeatures.description: AI dynamically adjusts bids in real-time to optimize based on conversion probability, audience quality, and campaign objectives.

aiFeatures.name: Audience Targeting
aiFeatures.description: Uses signals from website, CRM (Klaviyo, email), first-party data, and past campaign performance to identify ideal customer profile and find the right people at the right time on the right channels.
keyBenefits: Right people, right channels, right time targeting

aiFeatures.name: Performance-Driven Media Buying
aiFeatures.description: Powered by Adnexus Connect integrated SSP to ensure premium publisher placements with real-time data injection. Retrieval model targets most likely converters.

aiFeatures.name: Goal-Based Optimization
aiFeatures.description: Automatic optimization across audience segmentation, channel selection, and creative format based on campaign objectives including sales, traffic, and leads.
